page.title: 11Chapel St.Leonards Fayre.
page.content: Every July we have a Strawberry Fayre. There are lots of stalls and raffles.Sometimes there are maypole dances and morris dancers.Fancy dress is another thing which takes place on the day.Ther are games like throw the wellington boots and tug of war.Every year there is a fire engine parked at the bottom of the field.There are drawing competitions for those from five years to eleven years old.The police set up a four d special agent where they give you a card to remind you of things you must not do,like going with strangers;and you get a photograph aswell.This year we are having a Summer Fayre,nineteen eighty five,because the strawberrys were not ripe so there were cream teas instead.Tug of war matches are held between the locals and the Black Horse club.
